properties.description: The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: arguments
properties.description: (Optional) A mapping of arguments to include with the command.

properties.name: command
properties.description: (Required) Path to the command te be executed.

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Required) Name by which to reference the checkcommand

properties.name: templates
properties.description: (Optional) A list of Icinga2 templates to assign to the host.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: address
properties.description: - (Required) The address of the host.

properties.name: check_command
properties.description: (Required) The name of an existing Icinga2 CheckCommand object that is used to determine if the host is available or not.

properties.name: hostname
properties.description: (Required) The hostname of the host.

properties.name: templates
properties.description: (Optional) A list of Icinga2 templates to assign to the host.

properties.name: vars
properties.description: (Optional) A mapping of variables to assign to the host.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Required) The name of the hostgroup.

properties.name: display_name
properties.description: (Required) The name of the hostgroup to display in the Icinga2 interface.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: hostname
properties.description: - (Required) The hostname the notification applies to.

properties.name: command
properties.description: - (Required) Notification command to use.

properties.name: users
properties.description: - (Required) List of users to notification.

properties.name: servicename
properties.description: (Optional) Service to send notification for.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Required) The name of the Service object.

properties.name: check_command
properties.description: (Required) The name of an existing Icinga2 CheckCommand object that is used to determine if the service is available on the host.

properties.name: hostname
properties.description: (Required) The host to check the service's status on
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: name
properties.description: - (Required) The user.

properties.name: email
properties.description: (Optional) An email string for this user. Useful for notification commands.
